Key Match Events: Dang Van Lam made three important saves in the first half
Dang Van Lam rushed out one beat slower than his opponent, and could not stop Mohanad Ali's header in time
Post-Match Reflections: Dang Van Lam regretted when the Vietnamese team lost to Iraq at the last minute
Van Lam believes the team will correct mistakes to come back strongest in the second qualifying round of the 2026 World Cup in Asia
Captain Que Ngoc Hai also regretted the last-minute defeat, but still saw positive points
Van Lam thinks the young players will accumulate a lot of experience for the future
Others: The Vietnamese team tried their best, always having to play under great pressure from their opponents
The whole team showed high fighting spirit, admitting defeat in the last seconds was a grim outcome
